REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0519 reute d f BC-COLOROCS-<CLRX>-SIGNS 03-12 0052

TEXT.TITLE: COLOROCS <CLRX> SIGNS PACT WITH SHARP
TEXT.BODY: Colorocs Corp said it signed a manufacturing agreement with Sharp Corp <SHRP> of Japan for Sharp to build Colorocs' full-color copier. No other details of the agreement were disclosed, but the company said more details would follow shortly. Reuter
